mainEntity.name: Hui at Huria Marae
mainEntity.text: Hare Piahana, chairman of the Tauranga Tribal Committee addressing a gathering of Bay of Plenty and Waikato guests at Huria Marae.  Seated at centre is Turi Te Kani.

contentLocation.name: Judea, Tauranga, Bay of Plenty, New Zealand

associatedMedia.name: Mr P.E.Walshe at his potters wheel
associatedMedia.description: Second World War R.A.F. and P.O.W. veteran Mr P.E. Walsh working at his potters wheel.

associatedMedia.name: Three girls at Tuesday sports event
associatedMedia.description: Three students on the winners podium with sport field in the background.  Left to right: C. Byers, G. Wilson & L. Whitwell.

associatedMedia.name: View from Wharf Street
associatedMedia.description: From the Feature Page, shows the Bank of New Zealand next to a residential house with the harbour and Matapihi bridge in the background.

associatedMedia.name: Miss Phil Dumbleton
associatedMedia.description: Miss Phil Dumbleton and her dog Blue on the estuary.  Part of a photo shoot that included many other images and originally described as lady + dog + boat.  Housed within an Extras Feb 82 box.  An image from the same occasion was published in the Bay of Plenty Times on February 13, 1982 and again on February 21, 2007 as part of a Memories feature.

associatedMedia.name: Tauranga Girls College Sports
associatedMedia.description: Students L. Leonard, D. OSullivan & B. Leach with a koala bear mascot, amidst a crowd of students in sunhats.

associatedMedia.name: Springbok Rugby Game
associatedMedia.description: Depicts a barb wired line, heavily policed rugby field in Rotorua, prior to or during the Bay of Plenty vs Springboks game on September 2, 1981.  Note: Part of a photo shoot that included many other images and originally described as Spring Box Rugby and housed within an Extras Sept 81 box.

associatedMedia.name: Hui at Huria Marae
associatedMedia.description: Hare Piahana, chairman of the Tauranga Tribal Committee addressing a gathering of Bay of Plenty and Waikato guests at Huria Marae.  Seated at centre is Turi Te Kani.

associatedMedia.name: J.B. Aitken Shark Catch
associatedMedia.description: Joan Aitken standing next to a caught shark and an unidentified man with details on a boards as follows: Joan Aitcken, Date: 19th March, Fish: Thresher, Weight: 648, Launch: Rarangi.

associatedMedia.name: Cherub Class Yachts
associatedMedia.description: Several young people in yachts racing against the backdrop of the Matapihi rail bridge.

associatedMedia.name: Flight Lieutenant H.K. Griffiths with Mayor of Tauranga Mr D.S. Mitchell
associatedMedia.description: Flight Lieutenant H.K. Griffiths, Royal New Zealand Air Force Public Relations Officer, presenting the Mayor of Tauranga Mr D.S. Mitchell with a photograph of three Harvard aircraft.  The same type of aircraft took part in an aerobatic display over Tauranga on Thursday, March 23, 1961 in the late afternoon.

associatedMedia.name: Bogged Logging Truck
associatedMedia.description: An Andersens Transport truck on the beach getting hitched to a sand bogged second truck loaded with logs.  Behind them is a barge loaded with logs and the Tauranga Harbour.

associatedMedia.name: Thailand Charge dAffaires
associatedMedia.description: Thailand Charge dAffaires and his wife with Mayor of Tauranga Mr.D. Mitchell.

associatedMedia.name: Tauriko Sports Day
associatedMedia.description: Two boys having a pillow fight on a greased, wooden pole.
